import React, {Fragment, useState} from 'react'; import css from '../styles/main.scss' function Wallet(props) { const [tabsActiveDefault, setTabsActiveDefault] = useState([ false, true, false, false, false ]); const ActivateTab = index => { const reset = tabsActiveDefault.map(() => false); reset[index] = true; setTabsActiveDefault(reset); }; const [switchTab, setSwitchTab] = useState([true, false]); const ActivateSwitchTab = index => { const reset = switchTab.map(() => false); reset[index] = true; setSwitchTab(reset); }; const _class = { true: `${css.tab} ${css.active}`, false: `${css.tab}` }; const style = { true: {display: 'flex'}, false: {display: 'none'} }; const formStyle = { true: {display: 'block'}, false: {display: 'none'} }; return (
ActivateTab(0)} className={_class[tabsActiveDefault[0]]}>轉帳
ActivateTab(1)} className={_class[tabsActiveDefault[1]]}>存款
ActivateTab(2)} className={_class[tabsActiveDefault[2]]}>提款
ActivateTab(3)} className={_class[tabsActiveDefault[3]]}>歷史
ActivateTab(4)} className={_class[tabsActiveDefault[4]]}>更改密碼
ActivateSwitchTab(0)} className={_class[switchTab[0]]}>網上支付
ActivateSwitchTab(1)} className={_class[switchTab[1]]}>VIP存款區

如需協助，請洽在線客服詢問!

 ); } export default Wallet;
